About This Project

üë®‚Äçüíª About Me

Hi, my name is Aadi Arunkumar, and I‚Äôm a former student at **UCR** with a major in **Biology and Data Science**.

I created this website to solve a common issue I faced in **organic chemistry class**: the tedious process of searching multiple websites for chemical data. My goal was to create a **centralized platform** where all relevant chemical information is easily accessible in one place.

If you have feedback or notice any missing chemicals, feel free to email me at: aadithrowacct@gmail.com

üõ†Ô∏è How I Built This

I used **Material Safety Data Sheets (MSDS)** from my organic chemistry class to create a database of **30+ chemicals** using **MongoDB**.

I then built a **Flask backend**, which handles **searching, requests, and table generation** via API routes. The frontend was developed using **JavaScript, HTML, and CSS**.

The most challenging part of development was implementing the **search bar with autofill suggestions**, which took much longer than expected! Though there might be an easier way, as a **first-time developer**, I learned a lot from the experience.

üìÖ Project Timeline

While I originally started this project in **2023**, most of the work happened in **December and January**. My goal was to finish by the end of January, and after weeks of grinding, I finally completed it!

Although it took longer than expected, seeing the final result is incredibly satisfying.

üöÄ Looking Ahead

This was my first full-scale **full-stack development** project, and I‚Äôm excited to continue improving it.

I plan to **expand the database** by adding more chemicals and potentially introduce **new features** for better usability.

This isn‚Äôt the last project I‚Äôll build, so stay tuned for future updates!

); } export default About;
